TextBox

public TextBox(double x,
               double y,
               double width,
               double height)
Creates an rectangular visual objects with text inside

Parameters:
x - X coordinate of the upper-left corner of this rectangle
y - Y coordinate of the upper-left corner of this rectangle
width - the width (in pixel coordinate) of this rectangle
height - the width (in pixel coordinate) of this rectangle

x - X coordinate of the upper-left corner of this rectangle

width - the width (in pixel coordinate) of this rectangle
height - the width (in pixel coordinate) of this rectangle
text - text to be placed in the text box
